attributes.action: reduce university course fee from 9250-4250(inc international students)UG,PG,PHD
attributes.additional_details:
Since it's going to be online and everyone would be lacking university experience which is the main reason why students pay the university such a hefty fee.
With covid-19 around ,there are less part time jobs for students and even if they have sponsors due to the lack of work/jobs people are being paid less or even nothing , people are getting slowly into financial trouble as well.
To cope up with that the course fee should cut down by half since students are not able to utilize the university  at 100%.
attributes.background: To lower the university fee for all the students including international students of all course levels from 9250 to 4250.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
